flawed_nl_solution:
Jen scored 20 + 10 = <<20+10=20>>20 on the exam.
Sammy scored two less, so his score was20 - 2 = <<20-2=18>>18.
Thus, Sammy made 35 - 18 = <<35-18=17>>17 mistakes.
#### 17

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
